title: Brazen Girl
description: It only takes a second for her world to come crashing down.Jordan’s crash is a wake-up call for everyone. Recovering from a head injury brings new challenges no one is expecting or prepared to handle. Jordan begins to doubt that she has what it takes to make it as a pro skateboarder. Is she tough enough to be part of Beckett Steele’s world? Or is this crash a sign she lacks what it takes?With the filming Shred Live looming, Beck is forced to re-evaluate his priorities. The risks that come with being one of the world’s best skateboarders aren’t always what they seem. Add Jordan to the equation, and the dangers take on a whole new meaning.A few seconds can change everything. Especially mid-air on one of the largest half pipes in the world.
author: Ali Dean
